resources.string: You can visit our animals everyday from\n10 AM till 5 PM.
We are a small shelter for cats.\nBut sometimes we take care of other animals also.
Kotya was surrendered by her previous \"owner\". The \"owner\" said that it was difficult to care about Kotya (total bs). Kotya is the most well-behaved kitty in the world.
Yuki was found on the streets when she was about two months old. She is very talkative and brings a lot of fun to everyone.

Mila is the newest kitty in our shelter. She doesn\'t like when someone takes pictures of her, but adores when someone plays with her. But she also can play by herself. In spite being very playful, she is very quiet.
Dalmatinka is a pup who is always having fun.
Daisy is Dalmatinka\'s fiancée. Unfortunately her paw was caught in a fire once, so, now she has a scar.
Lisichka is a fox that was brought to our shelter from Finland as a gift from the real Santa Claus.
